General.Name: Intertech S.A. Inter. Technologies
General.Description: Intertech S.A. Inter. Technologies distributes technology products in Greece. It operates as a distributor of various brands, such as Panasonic, iLuv, Ricoh, Gestetner, and Satellite. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Elliniko, Greece. Intertech S.A. Inter. Technologies was formerly a subsidiary of Demco Group.
